mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, start_date, end_date, meal_count, health_score, created_at, ai_recommendation, ai_generated_at, health_tips FROM weekly_reports WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, user_id, start_date, end_date, meal_count, health_score, created_at, ai_recommendation, ai_generated_at, health_tips FROM weekly_reports WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO weekly_reports (user_id, start_date, end_date, meal_count, health_score, ai_recommendation, ai_generated_at, health_tips) VALUES (#{userId}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{mealCount}, #{healthScore}, #{aiRecommendation}, #{aiGeneratedAt}, #{healthTips})
mapper.update: UPDATE weekly_reports SET meal_count = #{mealCount}, health_score = #{healthScore}, ai_recommendation = #{aiRecommendation}, ai_generated_at = #{aiGeneratedAt}, health_tips = #{healthTips} WHERE id = #{id}
